sentences.en: A continuously variable potentionmeter is connected into the detector bridge network.
sentences.cn: 在检测器桥路中,接有可调电位器.

sentences.en: A detector sampled the reflected intensity at various angles.
sentences.cn: 探测器在不同的角度收集反射束的强度.

sentences.en: An aqueous caustic solution removes carrier gas impurities harmful to the detector cell.
sentences.cn: 苛性碱溶液去除运载气体中对检测元件有害的杂质.

sentences.en: The common - depth - point technique merely means the manifold repetition of each reflection observation with different source - detector geometry.
sentences.cn: 其深度点技术仅意味着用不同的震源 ― ―检波器的分布形式多次重复每个反射观测.

sentences.en: The common - depth - point technique merely means the manifold repetition of each reflection observation witn different source - detector geometry.
sentences.cn: 其深度点技术仅意味着用不同的震源 —— 检波器的分布形式多次重复每个反射观测.

sentences.en: The detector is housed in a streamlined cylindrical container.
sentences.cn: 探测器安装在流线型圆柱形容器内.

sentences.en: The detector must be operationally simple, reliable and robust.
sentences.cn: 探测器必须操作方便, 可靠而牢固.

sentences.en: The detector tube is filled with nitric oxide.
sentences.cn: 检测管中充满了氧化氮.

sentences.en: The image - dissector scanner is another heavily used and very successful low light level detector.
sentences.cn: 析象管扫描器是另一种常用而且很成功的微光探测器.

sentences.en: The output of the detector is the video - signal proper , with a 2 - volt swing.
sentences.cn: 检波器的输出是相应的视频信号 、 摆幅为2伏.

sentences.en: The output signal from the detector may be the blackening of a photographic emulsion.
sentences.cn: 探测器的输出信号可以是照相乳胶的黑度.

sentences.en: The signal is fed into a filter - amplifier which is transformercoupled to the video - detector.
sentences.cn: 这个信号送到滤波器 - 放大器,它是由变压器耦合到视频检波器的.

sentences.en: Thermopile is usually a blackened thermal detector.
sentences.cn: 热堆一般是个涂黑了的热探测器.

sentences.en: We are forced to use a multiplicity of separate detector arrays.
sentences.cn: 我们要尽力用多个分离的检测器组成.

sentences.en: We can imagine a seismic detector being bombarded by myriads of grains of sand.
sentences.cn: 我们可以想像检波器受几万个砂粒冲击的情景.

trans.tran_en: a machine or piece of equipment that finds or measures something
